description._content: Detail of the 1940s business directory for Deseronto, Ontario, found on the map of Hastings County. The businesses and telephone numbers listed are: "BUTCHERS E. M. ROACH, Butcheres, co. St. Goerge & Edmond Sts.................................................83-84 CABINS DAWSON'S QUINTE BEACH CAMP, Complete Tourist Service, Highway 2, Deseronto, Ont..........36-R12 FEED MILL, GRINDING & MIXING CLARKE'S FEED MILL, Deseronto, Ont....................................................59 FUNERAL HOME & AMBULANCE SERVICE E. J. GARDNER, Funeral Home, ...........................................................Days 67 Nights 70 GARAGES, SALES & SERVICE J. D. DAWSON, Garage, Ford Cars, Trucks & Tractors, Sales & Service, Deseronto, Ont. ........65 GARAGE, GENERAL REPAIRS MIDDLETON MOTORS, St. George & Edmond Sts., H. Middleton Prop. Deseronto, Ont. GENERAL STORE STOVER & SAGER, General Merchants, Deseronto, Ont. .........................................47 HOTELS ARLINGTON HOTEL, Meals-Rooms-Fishing Parties, Main St. Deseronto, Ont., Stan Marek Prop..............16"
